    D

    Decodes a binary string into the corresponding character.

    E

    Recursively encodes a symbol into its binary string representation.
    encode(String) - Static method in class huffmanzip.HuffmanZip

    encodeLoop(char) - Method in class huffman.HuffmanTree
    Iteratively encodes a symbol into its binary string representation.

    H

    HNode - Class in huffman
    Represents a node in a Huffman Tree.

    HNodeComparator - Class in huffman

    huffman - package huffman
     
    HuffmanTree - Class in huffman
    Represents a Huffman Tree for encoding and decoding characters based on their frequency in a given dataset.
    HuffmanTree(TreeMap<Character, Integer>) - Constructor for class huffman.HuffmanTree
    Constructs a Huffman Tree from character frequencies.
    huffmanzip - package huffmanzip
     
    HuffmanZip - Class in huffmanzip
    HuffmanZip is a utility class for compressing and decompressing files using Huffman Encoding.

    R
